segments.text: I'd like to apply for a personal loan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much would you like to borrow ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me check with our credit manager . ( later ) Our record shows that your credit rating is quite high . I don't think you'll have any problems .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our monthly interest is 1.5 % of the outstanding balance . Would you please fill out this application form ?
segments.speaker: S2
